articles.title: VW launches $5.8bn partnership with Tesla rival Rivian - BBC.com
articles.description: The firms will share EV technology as they face slowing demand and competition from Chinese rivals.
articles.content:
Volkswagen Group (VW) and Tesla rival Rivian have launched a joint venture, with the German car giant increasing its investment in the partnership.
The two companies say the deal is now worth $5.8bn… [+1972 chars]
